attributes.action: Abolish homework from the education system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a daily user of the education system, I commonly see many people NOT completing their homework. I have therefore come to the conclusion that homework is not popular for most youngsters and therefore would encourage anyone against homework to join this petition and get justice for youngsters!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
